text: WNDY may refer to: * WNDY-TV, a television station (channel 23 analog/32 digital) licensed to Marion, Indiana, United States * WNDY (FM), a radio station (91.3 FM) licensed to Crawfordsville, Indiana, United States * WNDY as the fictional television station around which the short-lived WIOU was based * WNDY as the fictional radio station in the Dolly Parton film Straight Talk
title: WNDY
